verses.roman:
eta bali' prerilā more hātasāni diyā
antardhāna kaila prabhu nija-gaṇa lañā

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; prerilā—dispatched; more—me; hātasāni—indication of the hand; diyā—giving; antardhāna kaila—disappeared; prabhu—my Lord; nija-gaṇa lañā—taking His personal associates.
translation: After saying this, He directed me toward Vṛndāvana by waving His hand. Then He disappeared with His associates.
